hypothesis_content.title: BTC 7-Day RSI Extreme Reversion in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC is in a NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 50%) and its 7-day RSI crosses below 30 (oversold) or above 70 (overbought), a mean reversion move of at least 3% toward the 50 RSI level will occur within the next 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes lack strong directional momentum, making extreme RSI readings more likely to be noise. Market participants often fade these extremes in range-bound environments. The 7-day RSI is sensitive enough to capture short-term overreactions.
entry_conditions: BTC 7-day RSI crosses below 30 (long entry) OR crosses above 70 (short entry)
Entry on close of candle confirming the cross

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3% price move in reversion direction from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If, after a qualifying RSI extreme, BTC continues trending in the same direction for >5% beyond entry without a 3% reversion within 3 days, the hypothesis is falsified.
